reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Doe's lectures are always insightful and engaging. He explains complex concepts with ease.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith is very knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit fast-paced. Overall, a good experience.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown knows the material well, but I found the lectures somewhat dry and difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is an excellent teacher. His enthusiasm for chemistry is contagious, and he makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very passionate about history, and it shows in her lectures. However, the exams were quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be quite monotonous. The labs, however, were well-organized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez offers a balanced view of economic theories. Her classes are well-structured and she encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is a brilliant philosopher. His thought-provoking lectures inspire deep reflection and critical thinking.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's deep understanding of literature is evident in her lectures. However, her grading is quite strict.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Moore is an outstanding professor. His dynamic teaching style and real-world examples make sociology incredibly interesting.
